example_sentences.example_en: The cow gives milk every morning.
example_sentences.example_fr: La vache donne du lait chaque matin.

example_sentences.example_en: The sheep grazes in the field.
example_sentences.example_fr: Le mouton broute dans le champ.

example_sentences.example_en: The goat climbs the hill easily.
example_sentences.example_fr: La chèvre grimpe facilement la colline.

example_sentences.example_en: The horse runs fast in the field.
example_sentences.example_fr: Le cheval court vite dans le champ.

example_sentences.example_en: The pig loves to roll in the mud.
example_sentences.example_fr: Le cochon adore se rouler dans la boue.

example_sentences.example_en: The chicken lays eggs every day.
example_sentences.example_fr: La poule pond des œufs chaque jour.

example_sentences.example_en: The duck swims in the pond.
example_sentences.example_fr: Le canard nage dans l'étang.

example_sentences.example_en: The goose honks loudly.
example_sentences.example_fr: L'oie cacarde bruyamment.

example_sentences.example_en: The turkey is a big bird.
example_sentences.example_fr: La dinde est un gros oiseau.

example_sentences.example_en: The donkey carries heavy loads.
example_sentences.example_fr: L'âne porte des charges lourdes.

example_sentences.example_en: The rabbit eats carrots.
example_sentences.example_fr: Le lapin mange des carottes.

example_sentences.example_en: The sheepdog guards the flock.
example_sentences.example_fr: Le berger garde le troupeau.

example_sentences.example_en: The rooster crows at dawn.
example_sentences.example_fr: Le coq chante à l'aube.

example_sentences.example_en: The calf stays close to its mother.
example_sentences.example_fr: Le veau reste près de sa mère.

example_sentences.example_en: The bull is strong and powerful.
example_sentences.example_fr: Le taureau est fort et puissant.

example_sentences.example_en: The lamb follows the sheep.
example_sentences.example_fr: L'agneau suit le mouton.

example_sentences.example_en: The mule carries supplies up the mountain.
example_sentences.example_fr: Le mulet porte des provisions en montagne.

example_sentences.example_en: The foal learns to walk quickly.
example_sentences.example_fr: Le poulain apprend à marcher rapidement.

example_sentences.example_en: The kid jumps around playfully.
example_sentences.example_fr: Le chevreau saute joyeusement.

example_sentences.example_en: The duckling follows its mother.
example_sentences.example_fr: Le caneton suit sa mère.

example_sentences.example_en: The piglet squeals loudly.
example_sentences.example_fr: Le porcelet couine bruyamment.

example_sentences.example_en: The pony is smaller than a horse.
example_sentences.example_fr: Le poney est plus petit qu'un cheval.
